con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:add="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing" xmlns:v1="http://www.telefonica.com/OCS/To2DE/OCS_types/v1_1"> <soapenv:Header> <add:ReplyTo> <add:Address>http://www.my.com/flammas/ac</add:Address> </add:ReplyTo> <add:MessageID>http://www.any.org/speluncis/profundum</add:MessageID> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <v1:deductBalanceRequest> <v1:appInfo> <!--type: ApplicationIdType--> <v1:applicationId>gero et</v1:applicationId> <!--type: ErReferenceType--> <v1:reference>sonoras imperio</v1:reference> </v1:appInfo> <v1:subscriberId> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 4 items at this level--> <!--type: E164NumberType--> <v1:e164Number>quae divum incedo</v1:e164Number> <!--type: string--> <v1:userName>verrantque per auras</v1:userName> <!--type: anyURI--> <v1:anyURI>http://www.sample.org/turbine/circum</v1:anyURI> <v1:ipAddress> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <!--type: Ipv4AddressType--> <v1:ipv4Address>nimborum in</v1:ipv4Address> <!--type: Ipv6AddressType--> <v1:ipv6Address>foedere certo</v1:ipv6Address> </v1:ipAddress> </v1:subscriberId> <v1:amount exponent="3" currencyCode="profundum quippe ferant">3</v1:amount> <!--type: WalletIdType--> <v1:walletId>et carcere</v1:walletId> <!--type: boolean--> <v1:allOrNothingFlag>true</v1:allOrNothingFlag> </v1:deductBalanceRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
